sanwidhanathmaka aparadha walakwima pilibanda dakunu aasiyanu kalapiya buddhimaya thorathuru huwamaru ha sambandhikaraka madhyasthanaya sthapitha kirima pilibanda awabodhatha giwisumakata elambaima - eksath jathinge mathdrawya ha aparadha pilibanda karyanshaye dakunu aasiyanu kalapiya karyalaya mangin kriyathmaka karanu labana 'dakunu aasiyanu mathdrawya pilibanda nithiya balathmaka kirime hakiyawa shakthimath kirima' pilibanda wyapruthiye sambandhikaraka madhyasthanaya shri lankawe sthapitha kirimata yojana wi atha.

gowi gataluwalata wisandum, gowi ki්rayakarakam, gewathu wagawa jayaga්rahaka jayaga්rahikawanta thyaga saha sahathika pirinamimata katayuthu yoda atha.dewana dinaya wu 21 da tharuna gowi dinaya lesa nam karamin tharuna tharuniyange ki්rayakarakam elidakwimath tharuna gowi samaja tharaga pawathwimatath katayuthu yoda thibe. 21 wanida krushikarma amathya hemakumara nanayakkara, uthuru mada palath samupakara karmantha ga්rama sanwardhana amathya ech.bi.semasinha yana mahathwarun pa්radhana amuththan lesa sahabhagi wethi.thunwana dinaya wu 22da gowi kantha dinaya da jathiya godanangime amathya es.em.chandrasena, mahamarga sanwardhana niyojya amathya dabliw.bi.eekanayaka, uthuru mada palath saukhya ki්rada amathya peshala bandara jayarathna yana mahathwarunge pa්radhanathwayen wishesha saukhya wadasatahan, kantha tharaga isaw sandaha thyaga labadima kantha nishpadana karana lada deshiya aahara handunwa dimada medina sidukare.hatharawana dinaya (23) pasal dinaya lesa namkara athi athara adhyapana amathya susil pe්rmajayantha, deshiya waidya amathya thissa karalliyadda, khanija thel sampath amathya duminda disanayaka, uthuru mada palath widuli bala mahamarga amathya aar.em.pi.bi.rathnayaka yana mahathwarunge pa්radhanathwayen pasal daruwange ki්rayakarakam, pasal daruwan krushikarmanthaya sandaha yomukara ganna aakaraya pahada dima, pasal sanskruthika sandarshana rashiyak pawathwimata katayuthu yoda atha.paswana dina (24) wyawasaya dinaya lesa namkara athi athara edina uthuru mada palath pa්radhana amathya barti pe්rmalal disanayaka, gowijana sewa niyojya amathya siripala gamlath yana mahathawarunge pa්radhanathwayen palatha thula gowi wyawasayakayin handunaganima, wishesha sandarshana pawathwimata katayuthu yoda atha.uthuru mada palath krushikarma, sathwa nishpadana, sathwa, saukhya, wanitha katayuthu, amathya ke.ech.nandasena mahatha pa්radarshanaya pilibandawa mese pawasuweya.

kawareku wiruddha wuwath ‘diwi nanguma’ panath ketumpatha wadi bahutharayakin sammatha kara ganime balaya parlimenthuwa sathuwa pawathina bawa janadhipathi nithignya manohara da silwa mahatha shreshtadhikaranaye di eeye (23) kiya.dilindu janathawage jiwana mattama ihala nanwime aramunin idiripath kara athi ‘diwi nanguma’ panath ketumpatha yatapath kirimata kisiwakuta nohaki yayi janadhipathi nithignyawaraya kiya sitiyeya.me panathin pihituwimata niyamitha prajamulika bankuwehi katayuthu adhikshanaya kirime balaya maha bankuwa sathuwana bawath maha bankuwa in bahara karana kisidu waganthiyak ema panath ketumpathehi athulath nowana bawath ee mahatha kiya.‘diwi naguma’ panath ketumpathata abhiyoga kala pethsamwala dewana wagauththarakara aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha wenuwen saha madihath pethsamkaruwan wenuwen karunu dakwamin ee mahatha kiya.aga winisuru aacharya shirani bandaranayaka, nimal gamini amarathunga, ke.
